what: Parse interaction files (block-formatted TXT or CSV/TSV) â€” parse_file
title: Parse interaction files (block-formatted TXT or CSV/TSV) â€” parse_file
text: Reads interaction file either block format (produced RNAhybrid/IntaRNA) tabular CSV/TSV file. block-formatted TXT files, function assumes following structure: line identifier `GENE_UTR_123`, followed alignment lines, line containing miRNA name (e.g. `hsa-miR-7160-5p`), least one line `key = value` pair (e.g. `interaction energy = -24.54 kcal/mol`).

title: Parse interaction files (block-formatted TXT or CSV/TSV) â€” parse_file
code: parse_file(   file,   pattern = "^.*_UTR_.*",   guess_tabular = TRUE,   mirna_col = NULL,   target_col = NULL )

TRUE, function attempts automatically detect whether file tabular. mirna_col Optional character. Name column containing miRNAs (applies tabular files). target_col Optional character. Name column containing targets/genes (applies tabular files).
